Nielsen | Software Engineer | Chicago | full-time

Everyone knows about the Nielsen Ratings - but what happens when demographics aren't enough? Nielsen's Media Analytics team is building a world-class platform for data science and analytics in the adtech space. We are utilizing cutting-edge open source technologies like kubernetes, docker, spark, scala, python, hive, glusterfs, and more to solve the data pipeline problem for good.

If this sounds interesting to you, please apply on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/271085501.

Additionally, feel free to reach out to me directly at grant{dot}nicholas{-at}nielsen{dot}com. I'm a software engineer working on the platform and I'll gladly answer any questions you have or speed the process along.
